thread.section_title: WSJ Life, Style & Arts: Weekend News and Reads
thread.title: Carol Burnett, In Charge Again

author: John Jurgensen
title: Carol Burnett, In Charge Again
text:
More than 60 years after her television debut—in which she belted a parody love song about then-Secretary of State John Foster Dulles—Carol Burnett is joining the big names flocking to streaming services.
On Friday, “A Little Help With Carol Burnett” begins on Netflix, with the 85-year-old comedian and a panel of children ages 5 to 9 offering advice to grown-up guests about problems ranging from smartphone addiction to marital tiffs.
...
